rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with expansive floor-to-ceiling windows to welcome natural light. Vastu optimized for energy flow.
Spacious living room with eco-friendly materials and ample daylight from north-facing large windows.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family gatherings. Includes natural light and ventilation.
Open plan kitchen integrated with dining space using sustainable materials and energy-efficient appliances.

openings.description: Balcony attached to the living room for additional natural light and ventilation
